page.title: 13SHOPPING
page.content:
Shopping in the village is quite good.There are five shops.P.Brown,F.Downey,E.Doyle,L.Lowry a chemist shop and J.Fegan a hardware shop.E.Doyle has a Mace shop and it is a large one too.Anyone could buy almost anything to eat in it.He is the cheapest shop too.P.Brown sells food,books,toys and newspapers.F.Downey also has lots of groceries.The Chemist belongs to L.Lowry.He sells medicine and animals medicine.J.Fegan is a hardware shop.He sells toys,watches,paints,pencils,pens lamps and televisions.
BY
LAURA FEGAN
